dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3608 RH: Grand Portage Band Per Capita Adjustment Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Nolan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
Additional sponsor: Mr. Young of Alaska
Reported from the Committee on Natural Resources
The Committees on Ways and Means and the Judiciary discharged; committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend the Act of October 19, 1973, concerning taxable income to members of the Grand Portage Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Grand Portage Band Per Capita Adjustment Act
.

section.header: Equal treatment of certain per capita income for purposes of Federal assistance

endorsement.action-desc: Reported from the Committee on Natural Resources
The Committees on Ways and Means and the Judiciary discharged; committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
